page.title: 16THE STAR INN
page.content: The Star is a medium sized public house;The building is about 200 years old. There are 2 bars seating 100 people a restaurant for 35 and a function room for 50. A variety of food is served, from a ploughmans lunch-bread, cheese,salads and pickle,4 course meals in the restaurant, a deluxe buffet with fresh salmon and roast beef. The extensive menu is changed frequently. 2 of the most popular items are lasagna and home made steak and kidney pie. Sunday lunch consists of a barbecue in the Summer and a traditional roast in the Winter. About 12,000 meals are served at the Star each year.
